name: master, which
description:
This is 'master, which', a new video game from Outhouse Media. CAPTAIN AMERICA'S IMPERIAL SHIELD is an action-packed adventure that pits the legendary hero against an epic evil force. The game features a unique blend of action, adventure and RPG elements designed to bring you fully immersed in one of the most epic World War II battles in gaming history.
CAPTAIN AMERICA: THE HULK #8 Written by BRIAN MICHAEL BENDIS Art by ANDY KUBERT Cover by ANDY KUBERT 1:25 Variant cover by TYLER KIRKHAM On sale MARCH 23 • 32 pg, FC, $2.99 US • RATED T Retailers: This issue will ship with two covers. Please see the order form for details. The Marvel Universe's most dangerous super hero is dead, but enough world is dying to bring a literal split in the ranks of the team. Can Captain America stand up to a new threat—and prevent the end of the world? "The Avengers assemble." RESIDENT EVIL #35 Written by DAN ABNETT Art by DAN GREEN Cover by DAVE JOHNSON 1:25 Variant cover by CHRIS SPROUSE On sale MARCH 30 • 32 pg, FC, $2.99 US • RATED T Retailers: This issue will ship with two covers.
